es.csic.iiia.nsm.perception

Interface View

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommunityView, TrafficView

    public interface View
    A view is a subset of a system state at a given time t. For instance, in a traffic scenario a view may be a description of the traffic situation in a part of the road, at time t.
    Author:
    "Javier Morales (jmorales@iiia.csic.es)"

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getAgentIds()
      Returns a List with the id's of the agents in the view
      float getSimilarity(View otherView)
      Returns a float describing how similar this view is to the otherView
